item.title: 3 Ways To Increase App Reliability With Polly
item.description: In this article, we’re going to take a look at the different ways that you can make your .NET applications more stable by using 3 different patterns: Retrying with decorrelated jitter, bulkheads and circuit breakers.

item.title: Creating a private helm repository using Github Pages Enterprise
item.description: In this article, we’re going to take a look at how to create a private Helm repository with Github Pages. This guide requires you to have a Github Enterprise license as private Github Pages are only available to enterprise customers. I’m showing this approach for the scenarios where setting up something like ChartMuseum isn’t possible or unwanted. Although this guide uses helm as the example, you can extend this to host anything under a privately authenticated Github page.
